entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as 'Potter' by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend and fellow student, who comes running up to them when they set off towards the castle. He is mentioned as 'Weasley' by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is in charge of the students. She is mentioned as shouting through a megaphone to give instructions.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, which Harry is a part of. It is mentioned as 'Gryffindor' by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: harry's heads of house
entities.description: The teachers in charge of the students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. They are mentioned as giving further information to the students.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron follow Professor McGonagall back into the school.
Ron accompanies Harry when they set off towards the castle with Professor McGonagall.
